name: Critical Mash
description:
So you think mashing is simple? Just you wait.

Mash - You must mash to push the opponent into meltdown. 

Breaking and Break meter - Need a break? Here, take one!
The break will allow you to halt all movement at the cost of meter.
Only the side with the most meter will be displayed.

Critical Mash - When near meltdown, you can no longer use break meter.
You must return to center before Critical Mash ends.

Controls - Left Mash (ASDF) Left Break (Q)
Right Mash (JKL;) Right Break (P)

The current build was created in two days.
